prompt_base: photograph of a beautiful young woman, captivating blue eyes, long smooth cyan blue hair, modern casual attire, subtle smile
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k uhd, dslr, soft cinematic lighting, high quality, film grain, Fujifilm XT3, detailed skin texture
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, drawing, 3d render, plastic, deformed, blur, bad anatomy, bad eyes, crossed eyes, disfigured, poorly drawn face, mutation, mutated, extra limb, ugly, poorly drawn hands, missing limb, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, malformed hands, blur, out of focus, unnatural hair texture
